identified-content.org: Southside Johnny and the Asbury Jukes (Music Group)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Music, Theater and Dance

abstract.p: Southside Johnny and Asbury Jukes are featured artists at Blues, Brews and BBQs event at Six Flags Great Adventure (S)

block.p: Some of the best shore area rock 'n' roll artists have honed their skills with Southside Johnny and the Asbury Jukes, a lead singer and band that have entertained New Jersey shore blues fans for 25 years and nearly a dozen albums. Southside and the Jukes will be featured next Saturday in the first of two days of Blues, Brews and BBQs at Six Flags Great Adventure.

Some of the best shore area rock 'n' roll artists have honed their skills with Southside Johnny and the Asbury Jukes, a lead singer and band that have entertained New Jersey shore blues fans for 25 years and nearly a dozen albums. Southside and the Jukes will be featured next Saturday in the first of two days of Blues, Brews and BBQs at Six Flags Great Adventure.
The festival will feature the Fabulous Thunderbirds as the headline act for Sunday evening. Also performing are NRBQ, Canned Heat, Magic Dick & Jay Geils and Peter Green of Fleetwood Mac fame.
